name: Axo Away
description:
Your best friend Axo moves to another planet with their family. Chat with them while they're exploring their new environment.

made during a one week game jam project at uni with the theme "social distancing"!

find me on insta: @morlshmorl_

art&game by me
all music and sfx from zapsplat.com
